role_description: An Ansible role that installs and configures ClamAV on Linux systems and installs Malwarebytes on Windows/Mac OS X
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs and configures ClamAV on Linux systems and installs Malwarebytes on Windows/Mac OS X. Clam AntiVirus is a free software, cross-platform and open-source antivirus software toolkit able to detect many types of malicious software, including viruses. One of its main uses is on mail servers as a server-side email virus scanner. Malwarebytes is an anti-malware software for Microsoft Windows, macOS, Chrome OS, Android, and iOS that finds and removes malware. Made by Malwarebytes Corporation, it was first released in January 2006.
